snippet.title: Mega-CD Longplay [070] Hook
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played By:- /Y\ad/Y\atty

Not a bad game if a little short and easy.  FMV clips are not of particuarly great quality but this version does add CD Audio and a little speech to the standard console version of the game.

Its not a perfect playthrough but hopefully not too dissapointing.  I fafed about a litle at the bosses as I figured them out but they all only require 3-4 hits to beat. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
